title: Herring salad
ingredients: ['250g soused herring fillets or pickled rollmops', '4 large potatoes, washed and quartered (unpeeled)', '1 large onion, diced', '2 hard-boiled eggs, diced', 'salt, to taste', '1 large tart apple, diced', '100g pickled cucumbers, sliced', 'For the dressing', '200g mayonnaise', '100g low fat yoghurt', '1 pinch white pepper', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon mustard or horseradish']
